# Introduction

EEUI is a standalone and complete framework based on WeexSDK development (EEUI only supports Android, iOS, and does not support WEB).

DANGER

EEUI is a three-party framework that is not developed or maintained by Apache Weex.

# Demo

# Components

In addition to the original Weex components, EEUI comes with many useful components:

  • <banner> (opens new window) - Carousel control, support for infinite loops, support for any component
  • <button> (opens new window) - preset common button
  • <grid> (opens new window) - a paged grid container
  • <icon> (opens new window) - Font icon, support 1126+ font icons
  • <marquee> (opens new window) - a container for horizontally scrolling text automatically
  • <navbar> (opens new window) - preset navigation bar
  • <ripple> (opens new window) - A water ripple effect container that produces an outward diffusion when a click on an element
  • <scroll-text> (opens new window) - A container for scrolling text horizontally, suitable for single-line announcements
  • <scroll-view> (opens new window) - List container, different from Weex's own list container, with native pull-down refresh + pull-up loading more
  • <tabbar> (opens new window) - Powerful tab page
  • <web-view> (opens new window) - Powerful web page container
  • More components... (opens new window)

# Modules

In addition to Weex's original modules, EEUI comes with many useful modules:

  • adDialog (opens new window) - ad popup
  • ajax (opens new window) - asynchronous request, support for get, post
  • alert (opens new window) - dialog box, prompt box, confirmation prompt box, input prompt box
  • captcha (opens new window) - verify popup, slide verification
  • keyboard (opens new window) - keyboard function, dynamically hide the soft keyboard, determine whether the soft keyboard is visible
  • loading (opens new window) - Wait for the pop-up window to support more than 12+ waits
  • navigationBar (opens new window) - system navigation title bar, will not be popped by the soft keyboard, causing the navigation bar to move up
  • newPage (opens new window) - page function, open page, dynamically load page, intercept Android physical return key, status bar font color, ..., etc. 20+ kinds of page related functions
  • openOtherApp (opens new window) - Open other apps , support to open WeChat, Alipay, qq, Jingdong
  • saveImage (opens new window) - save the network image to the local
  • getImageSize (opens new window) - Get the size of the web image
  • scaner (opens new window) - QR code scanning
  • share (opens new window) - text image system sharing
  • storage (opens new window) - data storage, support app cache (restart app data is not cleared), app global variables (restart app data cleanup)
  • system (opens new window) - system information, Android gets IMEI, iOS gets system information such as IFA
  • toast (opens new window) - Toast simple and easy toast
  • More modules... (opens new window)

# Plug-in Market

EEUI provides a complete plug-in market, which can add more business needs through the plug-in market when the original components and modules are not enough for business needs:

  • websocket (opens new window) - instant messaging
  • screenshots (opens new window) - Screenshot function components
  • citypicker (opens new window) - city selector
  • picture (opens new window) - picture selector, video selection, picture taking, video recording, compressed picture, preview picture, preview video
  • rongim (opens new window) - connection login, chat room business
  • umeng (opens new window) - Push module
  • pay (opens new window) - third party payment module (Alipay, WeChat payment)
  • audio (opens new window) - audio playback, audio duration
  • deviceInfo (opens new window) - device information, network status, device vibration, screen information, volume information, battery information
  • amap (opens new window) - amap
  • videoView (opens new window) - video player component
  • communication (opens new window) - make calls directly, send text messages, send mail
  • geolocation (opens new window) - get the current location, real-time monitoring and positioning
  • recorder (opens new window) - Recorder support channel, band
  • accelerometer (opens new window) - accelerator, get the current acceleration, real-time monitoring acceleration
  • compass (opens new window) - compass, get the current azimuth, real-time monitoring azimuth
  • Plugin market (opens new window)、Development plugin (opens new window)

# EEUI Ecological

  • eeui-cli - https://www.npmjs.com/package/eeui-cli (opens new window)
  • Chinese documentation - https://eeui.app/ (opens new window)
  • English documentation - In the process of perfecting
  • Plugin market - https://eeui.app/markets/ (opens new window)
  • Demo project - https://editor.eeui.app/#/case (opens new window)
  • Online editor - https://editor.eeui.app/ (opens new window)
  • Exchange Community - https://bbs.eeui.app/ (opens new window)
  • Hot update feature - https://eeui.app/update/ (opens new window)
  • Quickly generate app icons - https://eeui.app/guide/icons.html (opens new window)
  • Quickly generate startup images - https://eeui.app/guide/launch.html (opens new window)
